channel.title: I want one of these
channel.description:
[url]https://www.gibbstech.com/aquada.php[/url] [url]https://www.gibbstech.com/humdinga.php[/url] [url]https://www.gibbstech.com/mediacentre/quadski.php[/url]
:awesome:
I've literally wanted one of these since I was 8 years old or so.

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
One cannot own what one cannot see.

submerges too

Read full topic

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
And then a helicopter owns you. Air is simply the way to go.

Read full topic

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
[indent]I would rather
have a punctured lung
than waste my breath on you.[/indent](Err, sorry, I thought this was the Quote thread. I guess you also confused it for the Manly thread.)

Sure it’s based on the Humdinga, but it’s better-ized. More defensively & offensively capable. Plus it goes faster on the water, which is cooler. And I’d hate to have a standard Humdinga in the rain or snow… or hot summer sun… no wonder “I’d rather have one of these.”

Read full topic

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

By the way, take your three links and suck it, I’d rather have one of these.

So you need armor and heavy weapons on your boat-cars? How manly of you.

Besides, it’s based on the Humdinga.

Read full topic

item.description:
And a lack of cave-ins.

item.title: I want one of these

item.description:
HOLY SHIT that’s actually possible under current physics.

We just need to get a car and tiny plane down here:

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Or they could of course fly well and drive well. Although I will defer to your superior abilities of randomly making up the future. Plus boatcars have been done for 60 years. We should move on.

Read full topic

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Except if you fly, there’s no fucking purpose to drive on the ground. At least boat-cars have a purpose. The reason these are neat is because they can do both of them pretty well, instead of doing them both really shittily. Which is what a flying car would do, drive like shit and fly like shit.

Read full topic

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Meh, I’d really prefer if these people spent their time on flying cars. Boat cars are just so 1944.

Read full topic

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: rtanger
item.description:
One of the above, or one of each? Because I do, too.

Read full topic

item.title: I want one of these
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Not this year, dear, maybe for your birthday.

…I’ve seen the first and third before, which are kind of ridiculous, but not the Humdinga. I actually understand what the it’s going after, a really effective niche. It’s actually a pretty good design which demands further research (and a better name).

By the way, take your three links and suck it, I’d rather have one of these.

Read full topic
